thig5.5:1.1: “I used to worship fire, the moon,
thig5.5:1.3: I would go to the river ford
thig5.5:2.1: I took on many spiritual practices:
thig5.5:2.2: I shaved half of my head,
thig5.5:2.3: I set my sleeping place on the ground,
thig5.5:2.4: and ate no food at night.
thig5.5:3.1: At the same time I enjoyed jewelry and makeup,
thig5.5:3.4: afflicted with longing to gratify the senses.
thig5.5:4.3: After I accurately saw the body,
thig5.5:5.1: All states of existence have been cut off,
thig5.5:5.2: as well as desire and aspiration.
thig5.5:5.4: I have attained peace of mind.”
